titleInfo.title: I Am Thine, And Thine Only! 'Over the Left!'

mods.note: This piece is included in a bound volume of sheet music that was once owned by Miss Nora Gardner, who was a Tennessee resident. It is part of a compilation of "Comic Songs." The words to this love song were taken from The Knickerbocker, a New York City literary magazine. The last page is an advertisement for "A Select Catalogue of Popular Ballads."
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
